meanings.definition: A lifting device consisting of two or more legs with a tackle for hoisting heavy objects.
meanings.sent1: The shearlegs helped lift the heavy crate effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: The construction workers used shearlegs to raise the steel beams.
meanings.sent3: The shearlegs looked like giant metal spiders ready to lift.
meanings.sent4: The shearlegs stood tall like mechanical giants in the warehouse.
meanings.sent5: The shearlegs groaned under the weight of the massive machinery.

meanings.definition: A pair of legs with a crossbar used for supporting spars or other objects for hoisting or lowering.
meanings.sent1: The shearlegs held the wooden pole securely in place.
meanings.sent2: The sailors relied on shearlegs to raise the sail onto the mast.
meanings.sent3: The shearlegs propped up the spars like a pair of loyal friends.
meanings.sent4: The shearlegs intertwined with the mast, forming a sturdy support system.
meanings.sent5: The shearlegs cradled the spars delicately as they were lifted into position.
